mapper.insert: INSERT INTO fitness_class (name, type, instructor, time, location, capacity, status, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{name}, #{type}, #{instructor}, #{time}, #{location}, #{capacity}, #{status}, #{createdAt}, #{updatedAt})
mapper.select: SELECT r.reservation_id AS id, r.user_id, u.username AS userName, r.created_at AS registrationTime, r.status FROM reservation r LEFT JOIN user u ON r.user_id = u.user_id WHERE r.facility_id = #{id} ORDER BY r.created_at DESC
